nodes.text: The First Order military, under the command of Kylo Ren, massacred a village on the planet Tehar. Only two young siblings, Kel and Eila, survived the massacre, escaping by stowing away on a starship. When the First Order learned that there were survivors who could tell others of the atrocity, they set out to hunt down the two children.

Eventually, the children reached Colossus, a fueling station on the planet Castilon and, with the help of several residents, managed to fake their deaths and fool the First Order into believing it had successfully completed its mission.
The massacre on Tehar was first mentioned in the Star Wars Resistance episode "The Children from Tehar".
